84353.summary: Some customers in Fairmont Hot Springs are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84353.title: Nov 4 - Fairmont Hot Springs | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
